column4: I am using Edgy Eft When I run apt-get update it gives the following error 99% [5 Packages gzip 0]  [Waiting for headers]  [Waiting for headers]   2188B/s 0s
gzip: stdin: not in gzip format
Err http://in.archive.ubuntu.com edgy/universe Packages                         Sub-process gzip returned an error code (1)
Can someone tell me what the problem is?
sorry that's the a different problem
there is a no problem with some apt- proxys you need to type unset LANG before apt-get update
I didnt get the point. What exactly is the problem
try "unset LANG"  then do a "sudo apt-get upgrade"

I have another problem when Edgy starts up then the Ubuntu progress bar appears out of resolution sync and wraps around the screen but strangely this problem is not there in the pts or xserver but only in startup progress bar How do I sort it out?
what graphic card and what driver ?
i have a similar chipset and i'm not experianceing the same problem...
So how do I sort out the problem??
i'm unsure of what your problem is the graphics card you have should have no problems running with the mesa driver
But then why is upstart appearing out of sync while xserver and pts runs fine
sorry i don't know .. your out of my knowleadgebase

I have another problem when Edgy starts up then the Ubuntu progress bar appears out of resolution sync and wraps around the screen but strangely this problem is not there in the pts or xserver but only in startup progress bar How do I sort it out?
